Title: Dora the Explorer
Writer: Chris Gifford, Eric Weiner, Valerie Walsh
Actors: Ashley Flemming, Chris Guifford, Harrison Chad, Jake Burbage, Jose Zelaya, Kathleen Herles, Marc Weiner, Muhammed Cunningham, Sasha Tora, Sasha Toro
Plot: Dora is a cute little Hispanic girl with who goes on adventures with her red boot wearing monkey, conveniently named Boots. During her adventures we also get to meet her talking backpack (or la mochila) and the map who sings an annoyingly cute song. The show plays out almost like a computer adventure showing a mouse on different scenes where the kids make a decision. Dora asks your kids questions and then waits for a response. The main purpose of the show is to teach Spanish to English-speaking children.
